amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate concerning funding for children's graduate medical education.

vote.text: Amendment SA 354 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 354 proposed by Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR S4369-4370; text: CR S4370) To express the sense of the Senate concerning funding for children's graduate medical education.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 354 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 354 proposed by Senator DeWine.
